info.title: OpenAPI Specification
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.

200.description: Processing the checkout payment step with a not yet existing ApplePay payment

parameters.name: expected_total
parameters.description: The amount the customer expects to pay

parameters.name: braintree_device_data
parameters.description: The device_data generated by Braintree for Advanced Fraud Tools check

200.description: Completing the checkout when the order includes a Braintree payment

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify the amount of records returned, default is 25

application/json.error: You are not authorized to perform that action.
The resource you were looking for could not be found.

options.description: Hash containing the vendor_id. It's used to set the price based on vendor

quantity.description: default value when not provided is 1

application/json.error: The resource you were looking for could not be found.

204.description: Set a wallet payment source as the default user payment method
Remove the payment from the user wallet

restart_checkout.description: Whether the checkout should restart from the beginning (must be set for express checkouts)

200.description: Creating a PayPal express checkout transaction

tags.name: Orders
tags.description: Return an order, scoped to the current user

tags.name: Return Authorizations
tags.description: Get a single user return authorziation

tags.name: Store Credits API
tags.description: Get user store_credits and current account balance for the current user

tags.name: LineItem
tags.description: Representation of a single cart item for a specific variant with price of vendor

tags.name: Passwords
tags.description: Validate user email and password. Does not handle any session and only return the user
